extracted_entities.name: IEEE iMETA 2025: The 3rd International Conference on Intelligent Metaverse Technologies & Applications

tracks: Track 1: Large Language Models (LLMs) in the Metaverse
Track 2: Native AI for Metaverse Technologies

workshops.name: 1st International Workshop on Intelligent Digital Twins for Smart Cities in the Metaverse (IDTSC)
1st International Workshop on BCI Interfaces & Cognitive Engineering in the Metaverse (BCIME)
1st International Workshop on Ethical AI & Secure Metaverse Ecosystems (EASME)
1st International Workshop on Generative AI for Immersive Experience Design (GAIXR)
1st International Workshop on AI-Enhanced Learning Worlds (MetaLearn)
1st International Workshop on Standards, Protocols, and AI Agents for a Unified Metaverse (SPAAUM)

publication.note: IEEE is a technical sponsor of iMETA 2025. All accepted papers in iMETA 2025 and the workshops co-located with it will be submitted to IEEEXplore, dblp and Scopus for inclusion.

submission_guidelines.requirements: Manuscripts must be original, not previously published, or under review by another conference or journal. Submissions should adhere to the IEEE Conference Proceedings Format, using a double-column layout, 10-point font, and letter-sized paper.
submission_guidelines.page_limit: 6 pages for the review process, maximum of 8 pages for camera-ready version, subject to an overlength page fee.
